data.name: Captain America
data.description: A resilient leader who provides energy to his team while blocking enemy attacks.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> additional targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> or <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies, gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus on all attacks.

Dodge breaks this Chain. In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> or <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies, this attack cannot be dodged.

1.description:
When this character, <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> or <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, clear all negative effects from self. If this character is above <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, also gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from self + fill Speed Bar for <color=#86e619>2</color> random Captain Carter or Winter Soldier allies by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Block chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Block Amount.
1.nextUpgrade: On death of a <color=#fff568>WAVE I - AVENGER</color>, <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> or <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> ally, Heal all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health

On death of a <color=#fff568>WAVE I - AVENGER</color>, <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> or <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> ally, Heal all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Block chance + <color=#86e619>20%</color> for each <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color>, <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> or <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> ally.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Block Amount. In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Block Amount.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>WAVE I - AVENGER</color> and <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health for self and all <color=#fff568>WAVE I - AVENGER</color> allies.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health for self and all <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies.
